ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Family coming together
ygData.msgSnippet: Good for you two.  I live about 600 miles from my brother and we play eq together too. I got him hooked. Although I dont understand your last sentence, good
ygData.messageBody:
Good for you two. I live about 600 miles from my brother and we play eq
together too. I got him hooked. Although I dont understand your last
sentence, good luck.

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: kwarden@... [mailto:kwarden@...]
Sent: Monday, June 18, 2001 12:59 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Family coming together


I have been playing EQ for about 2 months now and have been telling
my sister all about the game. She has recently got a computer and
bought EQ. So now we have started playing together. This is the first
thing we have had in common in 20 years. A little weird to be killing
orcs with your sister but cool. Respond if you like not looking for
any though.





Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
